data.text:
Tumkur is a land whose countryside is dotted with temples, each narrating stories od divine grace. Set right in the heart of city, Vilasi Comforts brings contemporary accommodation features paired with impeccable service and amenities at the most reasonable rates. Guest can easily access the hotel as Tumkur Railway Station is just 2.3 km away and Tumakuru KSRTC Bus Stand is 2.3 km away. Guest can seek blessings at this holy place by visiting nearby places like Siddalingeshwara Temple(4.8 km), Gulur Ganesha Temple(7.8 km), Devarayana Durga(16.9 km) and many other are located in and around the city. Several food joints are also available in nearby areas. For a relaxed and comfortable stay, an array of facilities are offered such as Wi-Fi internet access, front desk, laundry/dry cleaning and travel guidance. Also other amenities like taxi services and airport transportation on demand can also be availed. The supportive staff of the hotel ensures that all whims of guest are timely completed. Every room in the hotel is uniquely designed with cozy interiors and offer exclusive facilities and services like air-conditioner, television, telephone, wardrobe. Every room has attached washroom with hot/cold water supply and essential toiletries. Have a delightful stay at Vilasi Comforts! Note: Drinking & Gambling is strictly prohibited. The hotel has the right to evict customers indulging in the same.

Mostrar más

With a stay at Green View Suites in Gubbi, you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Gubbi Jain Temple and Gulur Ganesh Temple. This hotel is 10.2 mi (16.5 km) from Siddarameshwara Temple and 27.2 mi (43.8 km) from Shivagange. Make use of convenient amenities such as a television in a common area, tour/ticket assistance, and a reception hall. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 50 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected.
